sentences.english: Finally, the paper did empirical analysis on the factors of life insurance surrender phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 最后本文对退保解约现象的影响因素进行实证分析。

sentences.english: Only applicable to surrender with the policy lost.
sentences.chinese: 只适用于退保时已遗失保单。

sentences.english: Has any insurer ever cancelled or declined your products liability?
sentences.chinese: 以往有无保险公司退保或拒保贵司产品责任险？

sentences.english: The policy holder is the applicant for termination benefit.
sentences.chinese: 退保金的申请人是投保人。

sentences.english: There may also be surrender charges in the early years.
sentences.chinese: 在投保初期的几年里，可能也会收取一定的退保费用。
